Data.Name: Logo Tee
Data.Description: Cotton blend lends for ultimate comfort.

ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Name: Logo Tee
ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Description: Cotton/ploy blend lends for ultimate comfort.

ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Name: Big Logo Shirt
ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Description: This Logo UA Tech T-Shirt is built with a system that wicks away sweat to keep your little one dry and comfortable.

ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Name: Classic Tee
ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Description: The V-Neck Embroidered T-Shirt keeps you looking fresh with its simple yet classic look. 100% cotton. Imported.

ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Name: Loose Fit Tee
ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Description: Our newest swim tees with a much looser fit than traditional rash guard for yet more comfort and versatility, is well known for great fit, function and colors.

ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Name: Cotton Tee
ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Description: Standard fit tee shirt, graphic printed with soft hand ink

ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Name: Sports Tee
ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Description: Comfortable fit whilst the flat-seam construction helps to minimise chafing and they also feature side panels, enhancing your range of movement.

ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Name: Classic T-Shirt
ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Description: All you need for a comfort day.

ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Name: Product Name 8
ProductsCatalogPage.xaml.Description: The long sleeves provide extra coverage and warmth and the sweat-wicking Dri-FIT fabric keeps you comfortable. The lightweight layer contours to your body and strategic mesh panels increase airflow. 92% polyester, 8% spandex.
